metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0222 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ModelMultipleChoiceField in Django 1.6.x before 1.6.10 and 1.7.x before 1.7.3, when show_hidden_initial is set to True, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service by submitting duplicate values, which triggers a large number of SQL queries.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0222` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.6.1-2ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.1-2ubuntu0.6').
